title: A day in the life of a "YouTube Farmer" it's not as easy as it looks!

tasks.task: Preparing for farm chores, checking the cow's mineral block, net wrapping a hay bale, moving the tires of the trucks, feeding the cows, moving an ATV, repairing the truck, refueling the tractor, cutting up logs with a sawmill, hydrating the truck, checking and refilling machinery fluids, applying hydraulic fluid, purchasing fuel and supplies.
subtasks: Wake up and prepare for the day.
Check on the cows and feed them.
Secure mineral blocks for the cows.
Net wrap and unroll hay bales for the cows.
Address various tire issues on vehicles (checking air pressure, replacing tire seals, filling tires with air).
Clean up and manage barn area, including disposing of old food containers and tidying the shop.
Operate outdoor kitchen grill for cooking.
Repair and maintain farm vehicles (check battery, jump start truck, repair door hinges, fill fuel).
Refuel various farm machinery, including tractors and sawmills.
Use a sawmill to process logs into timber for future projects.
Assist with feeding chickens and other farm animals.
Apply and manage hydraulic fluid in farm equipment.
Grocery shopping for supplies needed on the farm.
Address miscellaneous farm tasks, such as checking fencing, hydrating equipment, and general maintenance.
